Machine Learning

Machine Learning (Under-constructions)

So this is a page for us to just start understanding machine-learning. They note our status and todos about learning machine learning

Learning goals

This is a deep topic with many goals. So best to prioritize and order the goals

Using pre-trained models

This is probably the most appropriate and easiest of them all. It treats ML like some kind of super smart API. You should probably spend some time with ML5 and tensor flow JS for now. 

Algorithms and Machine-Learning actual

This is the actual learning for machine learning. This is very deep and varied. A whole new subject outside of your scope. I suggest taking the long game for this one. and watch Some stuff in the background. Learning it one concept at at time. 

Sources to learn from:

  • Coding train sessions (recommended) from algorithms to intelligence
  • ML4A: Machine learnings for artist. An alternate curicullum for machine learning. 

Topics identified to learn

  • K-Nearest Neighbour
  • from scalar, vectors, matrices to tensors
  • neural networks
  • Convolution neural network
  • regression
  • feature extraction
